price: Ey ileri gelenler, bu hususta bana görüşlerinizi belirtin. Siz hazır olmadıkça bir iş hakkında kesin karar veremem, dedi.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u aftūnī fī amrī mā kuntu qāṭiʿatan amran ḥattā tashhadūni
